comments.body: Perhaps it's worth mentioning that the `BIO` starts to evaluate at this moment
technically it's `CancelableFuture` which extends normal `Future` but I suppose it's best not to introduce too many things at the same time
I would keep the secret about `CancelableFuture` until we reach cancellation topic
I would love a mention of hidden error channel ( `Throwable` ), I'm not a fan of pretending `UIO` cannot fail and would like to be more upfront about it

## Error channels
At this point `BIO` is not much different from `Task` from [Monix library](https://monix.io/docs/3x/eval/task.html).
What makes `BIO` different is the bifunctor concept.
